pkgmetadata.longdescription: Europe SpatialPolygonsDataFrame Builder // Build custom Europe SpatialPolygonsDataFrame, if you don't know what is a SpatialPolygonsDataFrame see SpatialPolygons() in 'sp', by example for mapLayout() in 'antaresViz'. Antares is a powerful software developed by RTE to simulate and study electric power systems (more information about 'Antares' here: https://antares .rte-france.com).
